mean_en: a piece of clothing worn over the front of the body, from the chest or the waist down, and tied around the waist. Aprons are worn over other clothes to keep them clean, for example when cooking.
short_phrase: The chef wears a red and white apron.
sentence: I wear an apron while I cook so my clothes don't get dirty.
sentence_trans: 做饭时我穿着围裙，这样不会把我的衣服弄脏。
